name: canvas world
description:
Oh no! Your wizard master made a mistake 

of making the world black and white!! Luckily there

 is one way to bring back colors. To find world canvas 

and paints in four temple witch have a protection with

black and white spell. and paint canvas with paints.

----------------------------------------------

control

move-WASD(arrow keys does not work)

change dir of level-arrow keys(after power up)

space or Z for textbox

R to reset level

----------------------------------------------
